name: Steel Tech Battle Arena
description:
This is a singleplayer 3D isometric shooter arena, where you choose a stage and you have to defeat all enemies or the boss within it. There is a timer that tracks your best performance for each stage, and you can reset them in the stages menu.

This project will be improved further by adding character customization, more stages and a story mode to progress through the stages, and unlocking each one of them after its completion in the stages mode to replay.

CONTROLS (Only Mouse + Keyboard)

WASD / Arrow keysMove characterCursorAimLeft ClickShoot. Hold down to keep shootingERecharge. It recharges automatically when no ammo leftEscapePause game
